

   --------------------------------------------------------------------------------
              README file for LibSass Host Native for Windows x64 v1.3.1

   --------------------------------------------------------------------------------

           Copyright (c) 2015-2020 Andrey Taritsyn - http://www.taritsyn.ru


   ===========
   DESCRIPTION
   ===========
   This package complements the LibSassHost package and contains the native
   implementation of LibSass version 3.6.4 for Windows (x64).

   =============
   RELEASE NOTES
   =============
   1. Added support of the LibSass version 3.6.4;
   2. Fixed a error #35 “Unable to load DLL 'libsass' on Windows Server 2008 R2”.
      Special thanks to Herman Kan.

   ============
   PROJECT SITE
   ============
   http://github.com/Taritsyn/LibSassHost
